story: Auntie Lee works part time as a cleaner at a hawker center near her house. She is also currently the primary caregiver of her aging husband and 42 year old mentally disabled son.

Uncle Tim was the sole bread winner for his house hold and recently lost his job due to the Covid-19 pandemic. His wife is currently on expensive treatment for her injured knees sustatined during a past accident.
John and Andrew enjoy enrichment classes at their neighbourhood community center. Sunshine Center is a non-profit organisation that provides after school student care for lower income families.
Uncle Ahmad recently lost his job due to the Covid-19 pandemic and has 4 young children to feed.
Uncle Hock has relied on simple part-time jobs to earn a living however due to the Covid-19 pandemic he has been unemployed for 4 months and has been using up the last of his savings.
Uncle Tim runs a small traditional business passed down from his father. However due to the Covid-19 pandemic, his business has been experiencing losses for 6 months.
